attributes.action: Allow UK born Children with polish/Lithuanian parents have a UK passport from birth
attributes.additional_details: Allow UK born children with polish/Lithuanian parents to have a UK passport from birth like any other UK born child/person. I have found that most UK born children with polish/Lithuanian parents are not allowed a UK passport unless there both parents have been in the UK 5 years before the child is born, which is wrong because the child was born in the UK in a UK hospital jus like the rest of us UK people.
